name: Travala.com
description: Crypto-native travel booking platform founded in 2017 that enables users to book hotels, flights, and activities using cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology. Offers access to over 2.2 million properties across 230 countries, 400,000+ activities, and 600+ airlines globally. Accepts over 100 leading cryptocurrencies alongside traditional payment methods, with users earning rewards through the AVA Smart Program. The platform incorporates next-generation blockchain technology and tokenized incentives to create a frictionless booking experience aligned with decentralized principles.
